amendatorysection.para: When sponsored by the State Department of Education, student organizations referred to in section 79-297 shall be considered an integral part of the department and state-level chapters of such organizations shall not have separate corporate status. The department may enter into agreements with the corporate entities of national organizations for the use of names, logos, and other benefits of such organizations. Such organizations may, at the discretion of the State Board of Education, include postsecondary, adult, or alumni members in their activities.
